headline: How Investors May Respond To Cardinal Health (CAH) Expanding Automation and Global Device Rollout
summary: In early October 2025, Cardinal Health announced the international rollout of its Kendall SCD SmartFlow Compression System and revealed plans for a new automated pharmaceutical distribution center in Indianapolis, Indiana, partnering with Swisslog to implement cutting-edge robotic technology. This combination of product innovation and advanced logistics reflects Cardinal Health’s ongoing focus on strengthening global reach and operational efficiency across its healthcare segments. We'll...
